title: Ready for More Than This?
description:
We’re sure you’ve thought about it. What would happen if I just dropped everything and started new? What if I chased after the passion I’ve labeled as a hobby? Vox Creative and Straight Talk Wireless have come together to bring those stories — the ones that seek to answer that lingering “what if?” — to you. Join host Danielle Prescod as we celebrate the everyday extraordinary possibilities that reveal themselves when we stop knocking on doors and start drawing our own. These are the stories of six people who went against the grain and created a new path for themselves in pursuit of More Than This.
A podcast by Straight Talk Wireless, produced by Vox Creative in partnership with FRQNCY Media.
Read the trailer transcript at bit.ly/3zVsuzM
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
